description: Non-material amendment to planning permission dated 07/11/2023 ref 2023/2705 (Demolition of the Early Years building and construction of a new part one, part two storey building on the site of the Early Years building and retention and refurbishment of the existing Junior school building in order to accommodate a new SEN (special educational needs) school for Wandsworth's SEN secondary school children.) to allow alterations to boundary treatment, bicycle canopy and enclosure around ASHP. Installation of two additional louvres to east elevation.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Condition 2:
The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed: 
Site Location Plan - 141110-IBI-XX-00-PL-A-100-0001 Rev P1 
Existing Site Plan - 141110-IBI-XX-00-PL-A-100-0002 Rev P1 
Proposed Basement Floor Plan - PSSE-IBI-V1-BL-D-A-203110 Rev P2
Proposed Ground Floor Plan - PSSE-IBI-V1-00-D-A-203100 Rev P3
Proposed First Floor Plan - PSSE-IBI-V1-01-D-A-203101 Rev P2
Proposed Second Floor Plan - PSSE-IBI-V1-02-D-A-203102 Rev P2
Proposed Roof Plan - 141110-IBI-V1-RF-PL-A-200-0010 Rev C04
Proposed Site Plan (With Proposed Demolition) - 141110-IBI-XX-00-PL-A-100- 0016 Rev P1 
Proposed North and South Elevations - PSSE-IBI-V1-XX-D-A-204100 Rev P08
Proposed East and West Elevations - PSSE-IBI-V1-XX-D-A-204101 Rev P09
Proposed Courtyard Elevations - PSSE-IBI-V1-XX-D-A-204102 Rev P06
Proposed Building Sections - 141110-IBI-V1-XX-SE-A-200-5100 Rev C01
Landscape GA - 141110-IBI-00-XX-PL-L-70001 Rev P10 
Landscape Boundary Treatment Plan - 141110-IBI-00-XX-PL-L-70002 Rev P6 
Planting Strategy Plan - 141110-IBI-00-XX-PL-L-70003 Rev P7 
Existing and Proposed Broadwater Road Street Scene - PSSE-IBI-V1-XX-D-A-204008 Rev P02
Glazed link Sections: PSSE-IBI-V1-ZZ-D-A-251115 Rev P03 
Landscape - Typical Hardworks Sheet-10 - PSSE-ARC-V2-XX-D-L-701010 Rev C3
Reason: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development and to allow the local planning authority to review any potential changes to the scheme.
